name.en: An Epic Tale of Recollected Memories
name.ja: <ruby>語<rt>かた</rt></ruby>り<ruby>継<rt>つ</rt></ruby>がれし<ruby>英雄譚<rt>オモイデ</rt></ruby>

summoning_condition.en: This card is treated as a Legend Card while in the hand or Graveyard.

requirement.en: If you have 10 or more cards in your Deck, shuffle 2 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: Send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can add to your hand 1 Legend monster and/or 1 Legend Trap Card from among the cards sent.
